name: PHASE 1
description: Phase 1 is the ultimate working dog Belgian Malinois.

name: PHASE 2
description: Next Working Dog Breed will be voted on by the community, developed and released.

name: PHASE 3
description: Phase 3 introduces litters of puppies. You will have a random chance of generating a random litter of puppies for each Working Dog you are holding. Puppy Litters will be owned by the original owner of the parent and the Working Dog owner retains rights to the royalties generated from those puppies.
